descriptionHtml:
This is a simple mod. I switched the Shadowcloak of Nocturnal from a Power to a Lesser Power, so that you can use it more than once a day. I pretended to care about balance by reducing the spell\'s duration from 2 minutes to 1 minute.

I\'d consider this a cheat, but at least you \"have\" to earn it via completing the Thieves Guild questline.

You can grab this on the Steam Workshop instead, if you like: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=83405045
author: draeath
